doc.title: Les temps de venir
doc.plot: Adrienne (previously seen in Assayas's L'Heure D'Ete) is a successful French designer living in New York with her businessman husband James, an American. Adrienne's latest collection of work has been heavily criticized in France for being too commercial and too American. Has Adrienne abandoned her French heritage, creativity and past in favor of the concerns of commercialism and the global American culture and is that abandonment inevitable?
